data.name: Description_IndustrialWelder
data.value: The industrial welder has a large welding coverage area.

data.name: Description_IngotsPackage
data.value: Resurspak - a tightly packed package of bullion.

data.name: Description_InteriorTurret
data.value:
Autonomous anti-personnel turret. Must be manually loaded with MR-50A Rifle Magazines.
Maximum range: 800 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 600 m.

data.name: Description_MissileTurret
data.value:
Slow-shooting, explosive damage dealing, rocket launcher that can be loaded through conveyors. Uses Rockets.
Maximum range: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_Small_MissileTurret
data.value:
Slow-shooting, explosive damage dealing, rocket launcher that can be loaded through conveyors. Uses Rockets.
Maximum range: 1600 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1200 m.

data.name: Description_GatlingTurret
data.value:
Large-caliber turret that can be loaded using conveyors. Uses boxes of high-caliber Gatling ammunition.
Maximum range: 2400 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_Small_GatlingTurret
data.value:
Fast-shooting turret that can be loaded through conveyors. Uses Gatling Ammo Boxes.
Maximum range: 1400 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1200 m.

data.name: Description_LargeCalibreTurret
data.value:
A titanic turret perfectly suited for battles against heavily armored targets. Uses Artillery Shells.
Maximum range: 4000 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_HeavyCalibreGun
data.value:
A titanic gun perfectly suited for battles against heavily armored targets. Uses Artillery Shells.
Maximum range: 4000 m.

data.name: Description_MediumCalibreTurret
data.value:
Slower and bigger sibling of the Autocannon. Deals decent damage to armored targets. Uses Assault Cannon Shells.
Maximum range: 2800 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_Small_MediumCalibreGun
data.value:
Slower and bigger sibling of the Autocannon. Deals decent damage to armored targets. Uses Assault Cannon Shells.
Maximum range: 2800 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1200 m.

data.name: Description_MediumCalibreGun
data.value:
Slower and bigger sibling of the Autocannon. Deals decent damage to armored targets. Uses Assault Cannon Shells.
Maximum range: 2800 m.

data.name: Description_AutoCannonTurret
data.value:
Medium rate of fire, with a good punch in a small turret. Uses Autocannon Magazines.
Maximum range: 1800 m. Maximum range auto-aim: 1200 m.

data.name: Description_Autocannon
data.value:
Medium rate of fire, with a good punch. Uses Autocannon Magazines.
Maximum range: 1800 m.

data.name: Description_Railgun
data.value:
High range, maximum penetration, very low rate of fire. Needs to charge up before each shot. Uses Large Railgun Sabots.
Maximum range: 4000 m.

data.name: Description_SmallRailgun
data.value:
High range, maximum penetration, very low rate of fire. Needs to charge up before each shot. Uses Small Railgun Sabots.
Maximum range: 2800 m.

data.name: Description_GatlingGun
data.value:
Fast-shooting gun that can be loaded through conveyors. Uses Gatling Ammo Boxes.
Maximum range: 1400 m.

data.name: Description_RocketLauncher
data.value:
Slow-shooting, explosive damage dealing, rocket launcher that must be loaded manually. Uses Rockets.
Maximum range: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_LargeRocketLauncher
data.value:
A bigger version of the rocket launcher, capable of using the conveyor system to automatically reload. Uses Rockets.
Maximum range: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_RocketLauncherReload
data.value:
An advanced version of the rocket launcher, capable of using the conveyor system to automatically reload. Uses Rockets.
Maximum range: 1600 m.

data.name: Description_DefensiveCombatBlock
data.value:
Type: Combat
This can detect and target lock enemy grids up to 4000m. Additionally, it can be set up to flee to a predetermined location when it has detected an enemy.
When enemies are detected, this block takes priority over any active Task type blocks.

data.name: Description_OffensiveCombatBlock
data.value:
Type: Combat
This can detect, target lock, and engage enemy grids up to 4000m using customizable attack patterns.
When enemies are detected, this block takes priority over any active Task type blocks.

data.name: Description_ShieldGenerator
data.value:
The energy shield absorbs some of the kinetic damage received from impacts or projectiles.
Has high power consumption.

data.name: Description_SmallHeavyCalibreGun
data.value:
A titanic gun perfectly suited for battles against heavily armored targets. Uses Artillery Shells.
Maximum range: 4000 m.
